channel.title: Project RE5 Client **ONLY CLIENT RELEASE**
channel.description:
Hello guys! I'm Redfield. I've had a previous account, so don't think im just 'Leeching' Because i'm a first time poster. (Former account: Rebirthpk3d) Trying to recover my password for that one. But this is my new account I guess...from here on out. I'm going to release my client. It's a Project W1Ck3d base. I also, recomend IF using this client, to use an Allstar source. I Used Project W1Ck3d. :)
First, lets start with the credits.
%20 me-For modifying some Gameframe and The title screen. %79 W1Ck3d-His base and custom items %1-To whom ever he got his base from.
Here is some pictures.
Title screen. **In case you haven't noticed...RE5 stands for Resident Evil 5**
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/35mpdap.jpg[/img]
Client items shop. DESIGNED ALL BY W1CK3D.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/r76olu.jpg[/img]
So there is my client.
___________________ Additional information ___________________
I Added a song for the client. How far we've come by Matchbox20. (Really good song in my opinion, but you can change it if you wish)
This client is NOT leeched. And I am a more advanced member of moparscape forums than people think. So don't go saying stuff like "Lawl leeched hes a first time poster" Or "Ill go easy because you're a newbie" or anything like that. Because if I get enough of those 'hate' comments I'll just remove and take my client to silabsoft's forums.
Also, the file size is 25.49MB. So it's a pretty large file, but if you're using a very fast computer like mine, it will only take 5-10 minutes.
ADVICE: Do NOT play any online games such as Runescape, other Private sevrers, Xboxlive, PS3 or anything while downloading because 1. Takes longer and 2. Will lag the hell out of you! Well enough of my big ass mouth yapping away, heres the download.
http://uppit.com/LBD3WU
Enjoy,
~~Redfield.
PS-If you leech give me and W1ck3d credits. And save the %1 for the base founder/creator.

item.title: Project RE5 Client **ONLY CLIENT RELEASE**
item.dc:creator: @Redfield Redfield
item.description:
@Redfield wrote:

Lol cuz Red and white r the colors of umbrella and since this is Resident evil i based it off umbrella colors. will be totally different In project S.T.A.R.S[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2009, 03:32:00 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Kihomura, post:13, topic:267910”]Such an original name. I’m guessing your server is called RE5Scape?[/quote]
No.

item.description:
@Zet wrote:

noobie22:

This client sucks tbh. The models aren’t hard to make at all, just recolored. Honestly, Put more effort into things that you could create, but you don’t because you sit on your ass all day.

Seek help quick, you really need it. O.O

Read full topic
